events.text:
Press [color=#A5EFAC]X or the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON[/color] to attack. 
If you time it correctly you can chain your attack together!
You can also do a dash attack by [color=#A5EFAC]pressing X while DASHING[/color]!
To dodge attacks press [color=#A5EFAC]S[/color]. 
If you press [color=#A5EFAC]S while moving[/color] you can slide through enemies!
You can also use potions by pressing the numbers [color=#A5EFAC]1, 2 and 3[/color].
Good luck!
